metadata.description: Cinder & Ashe are a team of private investigators hired to find a kidnapped girl--but as they travel across the U.S. on her trail, their own traumatic pasts come back to haunt them. Ashe is a veteran of the Vietnam war, while Cinder is the daughter of another U.S. soldier and a native Vietnamese woman. This series was written by veteran comics and TV writer Gerry Conway, whose credits include The Amazing Spider-Man, The Avengers and the Justice League of America, as well as the TV series Batman: The Animated Series and Law & Order.
metadata.name: Cinder & Ashe
